title: I keep Getting the PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working message
body: For the few days I've been getting the "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" message and the only way I can get it to work is if I run as administrator but when I play a game my screen just freezes and I keep moving but I cant see whats happening for about 1-2 minutes. Sometimes it'll just freeze up and then I'd get a bugsplat and then I get a message saying that "Application League of Legends has been blocked from accessing Graphics Hardware." I've tried updating drivers, uninstalling and reinstalling and nothing seems to work so far

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing a number of issues that may include network issues. Your bugsplats sound like they may be caused by a number of problems, particularly a problematic driver. I recommend taking a look at [our guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) that specifically addresses these types of issues.

Let me know if you continue to see bugsplats after taking those steps.
I've tried all of the steps for the bugsplat issue from that guide and it still occurs and for network I've moved from my home to a college dorm and I've tried both wireless and wired connections.

Since you're still seeing these issues after taking the steps from that guide, I'd like you to reach out to our tech team. They have specialized knowledge about fixing these exact issues and have the tools necessary to investigate further.

If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), you can attach them to your [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to ensure our team has the context necessary to help you out.
